Title: One Day in Europe
Actors: Megan Gay, Lyudmila Tsvetkova, Andrey Sokolov, Oleg Assadulin
Plot: The day of the Champions League final between Galatasaray and Deportivo la Coruña stops life in four European cities, adding to the problems of tourists in trouble, who are already struggling with the language barrier.
Language: Russian, Turkish, English, French, German, Spanish, Hungarian, Gallegan
